meanings.sent1: The myxoid substance was slimy and gooey.
meanings.sent2: The doctor identified the myxoid growth as mucus-like.
meanings.sent3: The myxoid texture of the jelly made it hard to hold.
meanings.sent4: The myxoid consistency of the slime reminded me of a sticky mess.
meanings.sent5: The myxoid appearance of the gelatin was unsettling.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by the presence of mucin.
meanings.sent1: The myxoid tissue had a mucin-like quality.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the myxoid cells for their mucin content.
meanings.sent3: The myxoid nature of the substance made it slippery like mucin.
meanings.sent4: The myxoid properties of the solution were similar to mucin's characteristics.
meanings.sent5: The myxoid structure of the material resembled mucin under the microscope.
